objects.text: Pack of 64 Single Serve Bags | Real Cheddar Cheese | Crunchy Corn Texture

product_details.description: Product Description          The chip that packs a flavorful punch with the classic crunch. Boldly seasoned with three cheeses, tomatoes, onions and a savory blend of spices. Indulge yourself or share with large gatherings.             Manufacturer Contact Information          Plano, Tx 75024-4099 Pack of 64, 1.75 ounce large single serving bags (total of 112 ounces) Doritos tortilla chips with classic nacho cheese flavor Made of whole corn; flavorings feature real cheddar cheese Crunchy straight from the bag or after scooping up dip or salsa Ships in Certified Frustration Free Packaging Brand - Doritos ** Flavor - Nacho Cheese ** Unit Count - 112.0 Ounce ** Number of Items - 64 ** Type - Tortilla Chip **

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold and engaging layout centered around a snack product. The background consists of a dynamic radial gradient in bold reds, overlaid with geometric patterns and dark hexagonal shapes for depth. The main product image is centrally aligned, drawing viewer attention. The title text (id: "heading") is a large, white bold font, accompanied by a vivid subheading (id: "subheading") in a vibrant yellow. Below the product image lies a description text (id: "description") in white, followed by an eye-catching pricing text (id: "price") in yellow. A black call-to-action button (id: "cta_button_background") with contrasting yellow text (id: "cta") anchors the bottom.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Red: #900000
- Bright Red: #D50000
- Orange Accent: #FF6D00
- Yellow Highlight: #FFC107
- Black: #000000
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image of the Doritos Nacho Cheese bag utilizes a bold and vibrant color palette that commands attention. Dominated by a rich, fiery red (#C1121F), it creates intensity and excitement, ideal for snack branding. The triangular chips introduce a warm golden yellow (#F4A300) and orange (#EA6A00), symbolizing flavor and crunchiness. Accents of black (#000000) and white (#FFFFFF) in the logo provide strong contrast, enhancing readability and brand identity. The orange glow surrounding the triangular logo sharply blends the dark background with the highlighted chip, maintaining focus and energy. These colors blend seamlessly to create a dynamic and appetizing appeal.
